gratitude.title: Gratitude Tip
gratitude.detail: Try to be specific. Instead of 'my family', try 'the way my partner smiled this morning'.
gratitude.challenge: Think of a recent challenge. What did you learn from it? What strength did you discover?
gratitude.simpleThings: Notice the simple things. The warmth of the sun, the taste of your coffee, a comfortable chair.
gratitude.people: Think about someone who has helped you. Consider writing them a short thank you note.
gratitude.selfCompassion: Be grateful for yourself. Thank your body for its health or your mind for its resilience.
gratitude.nature: Connect with nature. Appreciate a beautiful tree, the sound of rain, or a colorful sunset.
gratitude.body: Thank your body for what it allows you to do, whether it's walking, seeing, or hugging.
gratitude.pastPresent: Reflect on a past difficulty you've overcome. Be grateful for your growth and where you are now.

faq.question: What is Yeser?
faq.answer: Yeser is a mobile application that helps you develop positive thinking habits by recording your daily gratitudes.

faq.question: Is my data safe?
faq.answer: Yes. Your data is stored securely. For detailed information, you can review our Privacy Policy.

faq.question: How can I provide feedback?
faq.answer: You can share your thoughts and suggestions about the app by sending an email to yeserapp@gmail.com.

faq.question: What are the benefits of keeping a gratitude journal?
faq.answer: Keeping a gratitude journal can improve your mood, reduce stress levels, enhance sleep quality, and increase overall life satisfaction. Regular recording helps you develop positive thinking habits.

dataController.title: Data Controller
dataController.content: As the Yeser application, we process your personal data as the data controller under the Personal Data Protection Law No. 6698 (KVKK).

collectedData.title: Collected Data
collectedData.content: The following personal data is collected in our application:
items: Your email address (for login)
Your username (optional)
Your gratitude journal entries
Notification preferences
Application usage statistics (anonymized)

dataProcessingPurposes.title: Data Processing Purposes
dataProcessingPurposes.content: Your personal data is processed for the following purposes:
items: Service provision and user experience improvement
Authentication and account security
Sending notifications (with your permission)
Application performance improvement
Fulfilling legal obligations

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We take industry-standard security measures to protect your data:
items: Encrypted data transmission (SSL/TLS)
Secure data storage (Supabase)
Access control and authorization
Regular security updates

kvkkRights.title: Your KVKK Rights
items: Learning whether your personal data is processed
Requesting information about your processed data
Learning the purposes of processing and whether they are used appropriately
Learning third parties to whom data is transferred domestically or abroad
Requesting correction of incomplete or incorrect data
Requesting deletion or destruction
Requesting notification of correction, deletion and destruction to third parties
Objecting to automated analysis resulting in adverse consequences
Requesting deletion from third parties where legally appropriate

dataRetention.title: Data Retention Period
dataRetention.content: Your personal data is stored for the period required by the processing purpose and for the period necessary to fulfill our legal obligations. When you delete your account, all your personal data is permanently deleted.

cookiesAnalytics.title: Cookies and Analytics
cookiesAnalytics.content: We collect anonymized analytical data in our application to improve user experience. This data is processed in a way that does not reveal your personal identity.

thirdPartyServices.title: Third Party Services
thirdPartyServices.content: Our application uses the following third party services:
items: Supabase (data storage and authentication)
Google OAuth (optional login)

accountDeletion.title: Account Deletion and Data Destruction
accountDeletion.content: You have the "right to be forgotten" under KVKK. Regarding account deletion:
items: Account Deletion Process: You can do this from Settings > Account > Delete My Account menu
Permanent Deletion: This process is irreversible and all your data is permanently deleted
Deleted Data: Your gratitude journal entries, account information, statistics, notification settings
Deletion Time: Account deletion process happens instantly
Backup Recommendation: We strongly recommend exporting your data before deletion
Re-registration: You can register again with the same email, but your past data will not return

otherRights.title: Using Your Other Rights
otherRights.content: To use your other rights under KVKK:
items: Data Export: You can export your data in PDF format from Settings > Data Export menu
Notification Settings: You can change them anytime from within the app
Data Correction: You can edit your profile information and gratitude entries
Support Request: You can contact us through the support channels in the app
Complaint Right: You have the right to apply to the Personal Data Protection Board

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For questions about our privacy policy or your KVKK rights, you can contact us through the support channels in the app. If you have any questions about the account deletion process, we recommend contacting us before performing the process.

footer.content: This privacy policy has been prepared in accordance with KVKK and other applicable data protection legislation and is updated regularly.

introduction.title: Introduction and Acceptance
introduction.content: Welcome to the Yeser mobile application. These Terms of Service govern your access to and use of the application. By downloading, installing or using the application, you agree to be bound by these terms. If you do not agree to the terms, please do not use the application.

premiumPayment.title: Premium Application and Payment Terms
premiumPayment.content: Yeser is a paid premium application. The application is purchased with a one-time payment of 39.99 TL and provides unlimited access to all features. Payment terms:
items: One-Time Payment: There is no subscription system, you only pay once
App Store/Google Play: All payments are processed through the relevant app stores
Refund Policy: Refund requests are subject to Apple/Google policies
VAT Included: The stated price includes VAT

usage.title: Application Usage and Age Limit
usage.content: You agree to use the application only for legal purposes and in accordance with these terms. The application is designed for users aged 13 and over. Users under 13 cannot use the application without parental permission.

prohibitedUses.title: Prohibited uses:
items: Sharing illegal or harmful content
Violating the rights of others
Endangering the security of the application
Unauthorized commercial use

accountManagement.title: Account Management and Termination
accountManagement.content: Terms for managing and terminating your account:
items: Account Security: You are responsible for account security
Account Deletion: Under KVKK, you can delete your account from Settings > Account > Delete My Account menu
Permanent Process: The deletion process is IRREVERSIBLE, all your data is instantly deleted
Backup Recommendation: Export your data before deletion
Re-registration: You can register again with the same email (data will not return)

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: The application and its content include information, software, texts, screens, images, videos, sounds and their design, selection and arrangement. All these elements belong to Yeser and are protected by international copyright, trademark, patent, trade secret and other intellectual property laws.

dataResponsibility.title: Data Responsibility and Backup
dataResponsibility.content: Responsibilities regarding data security and backup:
items: Regular Backup: Secure data storage is provided in the application
Data Loss: In case of technical failures, efforts are made for data recovery
User Responsibility: It is recommended that you regularly export your important data
Server Maintenance: Planned maintenance is announced in advance
